title.example: News from the COVID Tracking Project

addToCovidTrackingProjectWebsite.description: Whether the article should be included on the website.

date.description: Date on which data was collected by The COVID Tracking Project.

states.description: Number of states and territories included in the US dataset for this day.

positive.description: Individuals with confirmed or probable COVID-19 per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

negative.description: Individuals with a completed viral test that returned a negative result. For states / territories that do not report this number directly, we compute it using one of several methods, depending on which data points the state provides.

pending.description: Tests whose results have not yet been reported.

hospitalizedCurrently.description: Individuals who are currently hospitalized with COVID-19. Definitions vary by state / territory. Where possible, we report hospitalizations with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

hospitalizedCumulative.description: Total number of individuals who have ever been hospitalized with COVID-19.  Definitions vary by state / territory. Where possible, we report hospitalizations with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

inIcuCurrently.description: Individuals who are currently hospitalized in the Intensive Care Unit with COVID-19. Definitions vary by state / territory. Where possible, we report patients in the ICU with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

inIcuCumulative.description: Total number of individuals who have ever been hospitalized in the Intensive Care Unit with COVID-19. Definitions vary by state / territory. Where possible, we report patients in the ICU with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

onVentilatorCurrently.description: Individuals who are currently hospitalized under advanced ventilation with COVID-19. Definitions vary by state / territory. Where possible, we report patients on ventilation with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

onVentilatorCumulative.description: Total number of individuals who have ever been hospitalized under advanced ventilation with COVID-19. Definitions vary by state / territory. Where possible, we report patients on ventilation with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

recovered.description: Individuals who have recovered from COVID-19. Definitions vary by state / territory.

dateChecked.description: Deprecated. This is an old label for *lastUpdateEt*.

death.description: Total fatalities with confirmed OR probable COVID-19 case diagnosis (per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/)). In states where the information is available, it only tracks fatalities with confirmed OR probable COVID-19 case diagnosis where COVID-19 is an underlying cause of death according to the death certificate based on [WHO guidelines](https://www.who.int/classifications/icd/Guidelines_Cause_of_Death_COVID-19.pdf?ua=1).

total.description: Deprecated. Computed by adding *positive*, *negative*, and *pending* values.

totalTestResults.description: Where possible, we report total tests in units of people tested, rather than units of specimens tested. Currently computed by adding positive and negative values because some states do not report totals and to work around different reporting cadences for cases and tests.

posNeg.description: Deprecated. Computed by adding *positive* and *negative* values.

deathIncrease.description: Increase in *death* computed by subtracting the value of *death* for the previous day from the value of *death* for the current day.

hospitalizedIncrease.description: Increase in *hospitalizedCumulative* computed by subtracting the value of *hospitalizedCumulative* for the previous day from the value of *hospitalizedCumulative* for the current day.

negativeIncrease.description: Increase in *negative* computed by subtracting the value of *negative* for the previous day from the value for *negative* from the current day.

positiveIncrease.description: Increase in *positive* computed by subtracting the value of *positive* from the previous day from the value of *positive* for the current day.

totalTestResultsIncrease.description: Deprecated. Increase in *totalTestResults* computed by subtracting the value of *totalTestResults* for the previous day from the value of *totalTestResults* for the current day.

anyPosData.description: The state reports any positive case data by race/ethnicity.

anyDeathData.description: The state reports any death data by race/ethnicity.

anyPosData.description: The state reports any positive case data by race/ethnicity.

anyDeathData.description: The state reports any death data by race/ethnicity.

blackLivesLost.description: Number of black lives lost to the coronavirus.

blackLivesExpectedMultiplier.description: Expected lives lost based on population.

statesReportingCases.description: The number of states reporting cases broken down by race or ethnicity.

statesReportingDeaths.description: The number of states reporting deaths broken down by race or ethnicity.

covid19Site.description: URL to the state's COVID website

covid19SiteSecondary.description: URL to the state's secondary COVID website

covid19SiteTertiary.description: URL to the state's tertiary COVID website

covid19SiteOld.description: URL to the state's old COVID website

date.description: Date on which data was collected by The COVID Tracking Project.

state.description: Two-letter abbreviation for the state or territory.

fips.description: Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) code for the state or territory.
fips.x-internalNote: This is computed from [this static list of FIPS codes](https://github.com/COVID19Tracking/covid-public-api-build/blob/master/config/state-names.js)

positive.description: Individuals with confirmed or probable COVID-19 per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

positiveIncrease.description: Increase in *positive* computed by subtracting the value of *positive* from the previous day from the value of *positive* for the current day.
positiveIncrease.x-internalNote: This field is computed by subtracting the prior date's value for positive from the current date

negative.description: Individuals with a completed viral test that returned a negative result. For states / territories that do not report this number directly, we compute it using one of several methods, depending on which data points the state provides.

negativeIncrease.x-internalNote: This field is computed by subtracting the prior date's value for negative from the current date

pending.description: Tests whose results have not yet been reported.

total.x-internalNote: This is a deprecated field that adds up Positive, Negative, and Pending spreadsheet fields.

totalTestResults.description: Where possible, we report total tests in units of people tested, rather than units of specimens tested. Currently computed by adding _positive_ and _negative_ values because some states do not report totals and to work around different reporting cadences for cases and tests.
totalTestResults.x-internalNote: Adds up Positive and Negative spreadsheet fields.

totalTestResultsIncrease.x-internalNote: Increase in *totalTestResults* computed by subtracting the value of *totalTestResults* for the previous day from the value of *totalTestResults* for the current day.

posNeg.x-internalNote: Adds up Positive and Negative spreadsheet fields.

hospitalizedCurrently.description: Individuals who are currently hospitalized with COVID-19. Definitions vary by state / territory. Where possible, we report hospitalizations with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

hospitalizedCumulative.description: Total number of individuals who have ever been hospitalized with COVID-19.  Definitions vary by state / territory. Where possible, we report hospitalizations with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

inIcuCurrently.description: Individuals who are currently hospitalized in the Intensive Care Unit with COVID-19. Definitions vary by state / territory. Where possible, we report patients in the ICU with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

inIcuCumulative.description: Total number of individuals who have ever been hospitalized in the Intensive Care Unit with COVID-19. Definitions vary by state / territory. Where possible, we report patients in the ICU with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

onVentilatorCurrently.description: Individuals who are currently hospitalized under advanced ventilation with COVID-19. Definitions vary by state / territory. Where possible, we report patients on ventilation with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

onVentilatorCumulative.description: Total number of individuals who have ever been hospitalized under advanced ventilation with COVID-19. Definitions vary by state / territory. Where possible, we report patients on ventilation with confirmed or probable COVID-19 cases per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/).

recovered.description: Individuals who have recovered from COVID-19. Definitions vary by state / territory.

dataQualityGrade.description: The COVID Tracking Project grade of the completeness of the data reporting by a  state.

lastUpdateEt.description: Date and time in Eastern time the state or territory last updated the data.

dateModified.x-internalNote: This is a re-formatted value of "Last Update ET" forced into UTC format for historic reasons.

checkTimeEt.x-internalNote: This is a re-formatted value of "Last Update ET" forced into LL/dd HH:mm America/New_York format for historic reasons.

death.description: Total fatalities with confirmed OR probable COVID-19 case diagnosis (per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/)). In states where the information is available, it only tracks fatalities with confirmed OR probable COVID-19 case diagnosis where COVID-19 is an underlying cause of death according to the death certificate based on [WHO guidelines](https://www.who.int/classifications/icd/Guidelines_Cause_of_Death_COVID-19.pdf?ua=1).

deathIncrease.x-internalNote: Increase in *death* computed by subtracting the value of *death* for the previous day from the value of *death* for the current day.

hospitalizedIncrease.x-internalNote: Increase in *hospitalized* computed by subtracting the value of *hospitalizedCumulative* for the previous day from the value of *hospitalizedCumulative* for the current day.

dateChecked.x-internalNote: This is an old label for "Last Update ET".

hash.description: Deprecated - A hash of the current record.
hash.x-internalNote: A hash we provide for consumers so they can invalidate their cache if the values of this row has changed.

positiveTestsViral.description: Completed viral tests that returned positive results.

negativeTestsViral.description: Completed viral tests that returned negative results.

positiveCasesViral.description: Individuals with a completed viral test that returned a positive result.

deathConfirmed.description: Total fatalities with confirmed COVID-19 case diagnosis (per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/)). In states where the information is available, it only tracks fatalities with confirmed COVID-19 case diagnosis where COVID-19 is an underlying cause of death according to the death certificate based on [WHO guidelines](https://www.who.int/classifications/icd/Guidelines_Cause_of_Death_COVID-19.pdf?ua=1).

deathProbable.description: Total fatalities with probable COVID-19 case diagnosis (per the expanded [CSTE case definition](https://cdn.ymaws.com/www.cste.org/resource/resmgr/2020ps/Interim-20-ID-01_COVID-19.pdf) of April 5th, 2020 [approved by the CDC](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/nndss/conditions/coronavirus-disease-2019-covid-19/case-definition/2020/). In states where the information is available, it only tracks fatalities with probable COVID-19 case diagnosis where COVID-19 is an underlying cause of death according to the death certificate based on [WHO guidelines](https://www.who.int/classifications/icd/Guidelines_Cause_of_Death_COVID-19.pdf?ua=1).

buildTime.description: The last time the API was built.

runNumber.description: The run ID. Set to zero if it is a non-production run.

production.description: Whether this is a production build of the API.
